I_D TESTING:
-R COMMANDS
-RS1 = 2
-RS2 = 4
-WRITE 20 ON RS1 (FOR TESTING REGFILE)
-WRITE 40 ON RS2 (FOR TESTING REGFILE)
-RD  = 1


0000000 00100 00010 000 00001 0110011 -- 4260019    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000000000 || 11776  ADD
0100000 00100 00010 000 00001 0110011 -- 1078001843 -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000100000 || 11808  SUB
0000000 00100 00010 001 00001 0110011 -- 4264115    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111011100000 || 12000  SLL
0000000 00100 00010 010 00001 0110011 -- 4268211    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000101000 || 11816  SLT
0000000 00100 00010 011 00001 0110011 -- 4272307    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111110101000 || 12200  SLTU
0000000 00100 00010 100 00001 0110011 -- 4276403    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111101000000 || 12096  XOR 
0000000 00100 00010 101 00001 0110011 -- 4280499    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111001100000 || 11872  SRL
0100000 00100 00010 101 00001 0110011 -- 1078022323 -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111101100000 || 12128  SRA
0000000 00100 00010 110 00001 0110011 -- 4284595    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111011000000 || 11968  OR
0000000 00100 00010 111 00001 0110011 -- 4288691    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111001000000 || 11840  AND

TEST PASSED (I_DTEST_R.vwf)
